attributes.action: make prescription charges for those on incapacity benefit free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
those on jobseekers get free prescriptions,while those with long term conditions on incapacity benefit have to pay for there prescriptions,surely those with long term health conditions need free prescriptions.
the government should make a level playing field and make prescriptions free for all those on benefits
